snippet: Indian tribes that consider a high mountain prairie in the Black Hills of South Dakota to be sacred have raised enough money to purchase the land so that it can be preserved for religious ceremonies, the tribes announced.
abstract: Several Sioux tribes that consider a high mountain prairie in the Black Hills of South Dakota to be sacred have raised enough money to purchase the land so that it can be preserved for religious ceremonies.
lead_paragraph: Indian tribes that consider a high mountain prairie in the Black Hills of South Dakota to be sacred have raised enough money to purchase the land so that it can be preserved for religious ceremonies, the tribes announced.

headline.seo: South Dakota: Tribes Raise Money for Sacred Land
headline.main: South Dakota: Tribes Raise Money for Sacred Land
headline.print_headline: South Dakota: Tribes Raise Money For Sacred Land
